## SimpleInputDateTimeSelectorComponent.setDisabled() method

Sets as 'control' disabled

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDisabled(disabled?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  disabled | boolean | Indication whether sets value as disabled, if omitted it is same as disabled set to true |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
